description: Use module field to map domain concepts to source code folder structure. Module names MUST exactly match folder paths where they exist using dot notation for nesting.

do.description: Module names follow same conventions as classes and match actual folder structure

guidance.description: Module MUST exactly match source code folder structure using dot notation
example: (Use dot notation for nested folders, omit 'src' prefix)

guidance.description: Module names are clear, descriptive, and match actual folder names (not generic terms)
example: (Clear names that match real folders: repl_cli/, actions/render/, scanners/domain_model/)

guidance.description: Every domain concept MUST have a module field - no exceptions
example: (All concepts include module field mapping to their source location)

dont.description: Don't use generic module names, don't omit module field, don't use slash notation

guidance.description: Don't include 'src' prefix or use slash notation instead of dots
example: module: 'repl_cli/cli_bot' (WRONG: uses slashes instead of dots)
(Should be: 'repl_cli' and 'repl_cli.cli_bot' with dots, no src prefix)

guidance.description: Don't use generic or vague module names - match actual folder names
Don't omit the module field - every concept requires it
example: (Every concept MUST include module field mapping to source folder)
